oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Mac Gayden - 2018-02-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Mac Gayden from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 12, 2018. In support of the exhibition Dylan, Cash and the Nashville Cats.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mac Gayden;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Unidentified song begins in progress (Mickey Raphael on harmonica) / (01:53) Mac talks about Mickey Raphael / (02:16) Introduction of the band by Oceana Gayden. Band members include Chuck Foster-keyboards, Billy Mercer-bass, Mac Gayden Jr-guitar, Dave Scalia-drums, Alex Libre (sic) -guitar, Vicki Caraco and Etta Britt-vocalists along with Oceana Gayden / (03:27) Performs Come To Me Tonight / (08:21) Introduction of Diane Davidson / (08:35) Comments from Diane / (09:19) Performs Ain't Gonna Be Treated This Way / (14:25) Introduces the next song / (14:51) Performs Blood Is Not The Answer / (19:07) Performs 12 O'Clock High / (23:40) Introduces the next song / (24:15) Performs Back Fencing / (29:46) Introduces the next song and acknowledgements from Oceana / (31:48) Performs Crazy Mama / (35:37) Intros the next song / (36:27) Performs The Minstrel Is Free At Last / (45:56) Show end comments / (45:03) Introduces the next song / (46:07) Performs She Shot A Hole In My Soul /
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gayden, Mac; Davidson, Dianne; Raphael, Mickey;
